pages.name: Start
pages.text: The party arrives at the castle gates and are questioned by the guards. They present the sealed gift for the king and are let through. They are met by a Dardoine officer who happily escorts them to the throne room.

pages.name: Throne Room
pages.text:
Alex and Astraea kneel before the king and present him with the gift. He thanks them and opens it.

The gift turns out to be a letter. The king reads the letter while looking distraught.

"This letter contains a declaration of war against us from the king of Venoria!", the king proclaims.

Astraea stands up, seemingly unphased from the proclamation of war.

"It was only a matter of time, I suppose. I hereby pledge to defend Dardoine against the Venorian forces!"

The king accepts the offer and dismisses the party.

pages.name: Hallway
pages.text: It seems that it'll be a few weeks before preparations are ready to defend against any incoming enemies. There should be lots to do in town in the meantime.
